TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HierarchicalDataBoundControl extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl
Public MustInherit Class HierarchicalDataBoundControl Inherits BaseDataBoundControl

summary.span: Serves as the base class for all ASP.NET version 2.0 data-bound controls that display their data in hierarchical form.

span.span: Serves as the base class for all ASP.NET version 2.0 data-bound controls that display their data in hierarchical form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是用于从 ASP.NET 层次结构数据源控件中检索数据并将该控件的用户界面元素绑定到该数据以供显示的 ASP.NET 控件的基类。The class is the base class used for ASP.NET controls that retrieve data from an ASP.NET hierarchical data source control and bind user-interface elements of the control to that data for display. 和类派生自。The and classes derive from . 不使用网页开发人员类直接; 相反，它们使用从此类派生的控件。Page developers do not use the class directly; instead, they use controls that derive from this class. 控件开发人员扩展此类，以创建可与实现的类的数据绑定控件接口和类派生自和类。Controls developers extend this class to create data-bound controls that work with classes that implement the interface and classes that derive from the and classes. 派生类时类，请替代方法来检索到的数据绑定控件的用户界面元素方法。When deriving a class from the class, override the method to bind the user-interface elements of your control to data retrieved by the method. 在大多数情况下，方法是在派生类中的设置将替代的唯一方法。In most cases, the method is the only method you will override in your derived class. 对于 ASP.NET 2.0 数据绑定控件，方法相当于方法，并被调用来将数据绑定在运行时。For ASP.NET 2.0 data-bound controls, the method is the equivalent of the method, and is called to bind data at run time. 方法调用和方法。The method calls the and methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生类类创建自定义的数据绑定控件。The following code example demonstrates how to derive a class from the class to create a custom data-bound control. `GeneologyTree`控件呈现`pre`HTML 部分，其中的数据以文本树检索从关联的数据源控件。The `GeneologyTree` control renders a `pre` HTML section with a text tree for the data retrieved from an associated data source control. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/CS/geneologytree.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/VB/geneologytree.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`GeneologyTree`控件，在前面的示例中定义并将其绑定到控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the `GeneologyTree` control, defined in the previous example, and bind it to an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/CS/rootviewcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/VB/rootviewvb.aspx#1)] 在代码示例中所访问的 geneology.xml 文件包含以下数据。The geneology.xml file accessed in the code example contains the following data. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法检索对象关联的数据源控件，通过调用从方法。The method retrieves a object from the associated data source control by calling the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用方法来检索从关联的数据源控件的对象以及如何调用方法来检索数据。The following code example demonstrates how the method is called to retrieve the object from the associated data source control and how the method is called to retrieve the data. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据绑定控件保持视图状态，该值指示是否当前绑定到数据中的值。The data-bound control maintains a value in view state that indicates whether it is currently bound to data. 方法将值设置为`true`。The method sets the value to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用时或更改页面的任何时间事件。The method is called when the or is changed any time after the page's event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用数据绑定控件方法如果数据绑定控件初始化后更改标识数据源的属性。The following code example demonstrates how a data-bound control can call the method if a property that identifies a data source is changed after the data-bound control is initialized. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性`true`情况下，HTTP 请求是回发和启用视图状态，但尚未绑定数据绑定控件中。The sets the property to `true` in cases where the HTTP request is a postback and view state is enabled but the data-bound control has not yet been bound. 这种情况下是常见的控件，如和在运行时更改控件的可见性的位置。This scenario is common with controls such as and where the visibility of the control is changed at run time.

summary.span: When overridden in a derived class, binds data from the data source to the control.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, binds data from the data source to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现此方法，而不是方法派生中的数据绑定控件时类。Implement this method instead of the method when you derive a data-bound control from the class. 放置控件的数据绑定中的逻辑保留和以错误的顺序引发的事件。Placing your control's data-binding logic in keeps the and events from being raised in the wrong order. 虽然基类提供了此方法中，没有特定实现方法由调用方法以将任何用户界面控件的值绑定到将检索的数据方法。While the base class provides no specific implementation for this method, the method is called by the method to bind the values of any user interface controls to the data that is retrieved by the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现从派生类中的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method in a class derived from . `GeneologyTree`控制循环访问和对象从其关联检索，并创建用于绑定到的数据的文本树状结构。The `GeneologyTree` control iterates through the and objects retrieved from its associated , and creates a text tree structure for the data it is bound to. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/CS/geneologytree.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/VB/geneologytree.vb#4)]

summary.span: Retrieves data from the associated data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 后检索数据时，将数据绑定到数据绑定控件的元素调用方法。The method is called, after data is retrieved, to bind data to elements of the data-bound control. 派生的类型重写此方法来检索数据，仅当默认实现是不够的。Derived types override this method to retrieve data only if the default implementation is not adequate.
